answer: The Pew-Knight Initiative (Pew Research Center and John S. and James L. Knight Foundation) does not explicitly name specific subprojects, but its comprehensive focus covers how Americans absorb civic information, form beliefs and identities, and engage in their communities, with research spanning various data-driven methodologies and topics throughout its multi-year research collaboration.
ground_truth: Pew Research Center and Knight Foundation联合项目（Pew-Knight Initiative）
